de.mrapp.android.validation

Interface ValidationListener<Type>

  • Type Parameters:
    Type - The type of the values, which should be validated

    public interface ValidationListener<Type>
    Defines the interface, a class, which should be notified, when a view has been validated, must implement.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onValidationFailure(Validateable<Type> view, Validator<Type> validator)
      The method, which is invoked, when a validation failed.
      void onValidationSuccess(Validateable<Type> view)
      The method, which is invoked, when a validation succeeded.

    • Method Detail

      • onValidationSuccess

        void onValidationSuccess(@NonNull
                         Validateable<Type> view)
        The method, which is invoked, when a validation succeeded.
        Parameters:
        view - The view, whose value has been validated, as an instance of the type Validateable

      • onValidationFailure

        void onValidationFailure(@NonNull
                         Validateable<Type> view,
                         @NonNull
                         Validator<Type> validator)
        The method, which is invoked, when a validation failed.
        Parameters:
        view - The view, whose value has been validated, as an instance of the type Validateable
        validator - The validator, which has been failed, as an instance of the type Validator
